description: Ensure HTML buttons expose an accessible label so screen readers announce their purpose.
recommendation: Provide visible text, aria-label, or aria-labelledby for <button> elements and input buttons. (WCAG 2.1 SC 4.1.2)
algorithm: Checks <button> text content and button-like <input> elements for accessible names via text/value/alt, aria-label/labelledby, title, or labels.
algorithm_advanced: Checks <button> and button-like <input> elements for accessible names via text/value/alt, aria-label/labelledby, title, or label associations.
